name: 汤米·钟 Tommy Chong
intro: Thomas B. Kin Chong[1] (born May 24, 1938) is a Canadian-American comedian, actor, writer, musician and cannabis rights activist who is known for his marijuana-themed Cheech & Chong comedy albums and movies with Cheech Marin, as well as playing the character Leo on Fox's That '70s Show. He became a naturalized United States citizen in the late 1980s.
birthplace: 加拿大,阿尔伯塔省,埃德蒙顿
